metadata.title: Friday, 10th March, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure,Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) why the construction of the Isoka-Mbesuma-Kasama road has stalled;
(c) what the cost of the outstanding works on the project was, as of June, 2022; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the rehabilitation of the Mpika - Kasama road will be completed; and

(b) what has caused the delay in completing the project. 194 Mr E Daka (Msanzala) - to ask the Minister of Health when the Government will commence construction of the following mini hospitals in Msanzala Parliamentary Constituency:

(d) Chikuse;                          (h) Muzenje. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Thanks – His Excellency the President’s Address– Motion (28th February) – Resumption of Debate: (Mr Siachisumo, MP). ____________________________
